value.halfverse:
All are corrupt and commit abominable acts;
 there is none who does any good.
value.verse: The fool has said in his heart, “There is no God.” *

value.halfverse:
to see if there is any who is wise,
 if there is one who seeks after God.
value.verse: The LORD looks down from heaven upon us all, *

value.halfverse: there is none who does good; no, not one.
value.verse:
Every one has proved faithless;
all alike have turned bad; *
Have they no knowledge, all those evildoers *
value.halfverse:
who eat up my people like bread
 and do not call upon the LORD?

value.verse: See how they tremble with fear, *
value.halfverse: because God is in the company of the righteous.
but the LORD is their refuge.
value.verse: Their aim is to confound the plans of the afflicted, *
Oh, that Israel’s deliverance would come out of Zion! *
value.halfverse:
when the LORD restores the fortunes of his people,
 Jacob will rejoice and Israel be glad.
